appointments.emptyDescription: It looks like you don't have any upcoming viewings yet. Search for housing on FindBolig.nu and wait for invitations.

auth.logoutConfirm: Your data is still stored on your device, but you will not be able to fetch new updates until you log in again.
auth.securityNote: Your credentials are sent directly to findbolig.nu - we never store them on our servers.

home.readyToFetch: Your appointments from FindBolig.nu are ready to be fetched.
home.noAppointmentsHint: Don't have any appointments yet? Use findbolig.nu to search for housing and wait for invitations.

landing.tagline: A better dashboard for your FindBolig.nu appointments
landing.description: We fetch your upcoming apartment viewings directly from findbolig.nu and display them in a convenient chronological list - with offline access and local storage.
landing.getStarted: Log in with your findbolig.nu account to get started.

stale.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again to fetch updates.

errors.timeout: findbolig.nu is not responding right now. Please try again later.
errors.timeoutLogin: Could not reach findbolig.nu to log in. Please try again later.
